name: CRM Bulk Data Creator Stack
author: Microsoft AI Solutions Team
description: Automated bulk data generation and import for CRM systems. Create thousands of test records, realistic customer data, and complex relationship structures.
longDescription: The CRM Bulk Data Creator Stack provides comprehensive tools for generating and importing large volumes of test data into CRM systems. Perfect for testing, training, and demo environments, this stack creates realistic customer records, opportunities, and relationships at scale.
features: Generate thousands of realistic customer records

useCases.title: Testing Environment Setup
useCases.description: Quickly populate test environments with realistic data for comprehensive testing scenarios.

useCases.title: Sales Training
useCases.description: Create realistic customer scenarios for sales team training and onboarding.

useCases.title: Demo Preparation
useCases.description: Generate industry-specific data for compelling product demonstrations.

useCases.title: Performance Testing
useCases.description: Create large datasets to test CRM performance and scalability.

components.name: bulk_crm_data_generator.py
components.description: Core data generation engine with customizable templates

components.name: dynamics_365_agent.py
components.description: Handles bulk import operations to Dynamics 365

components.name: OneClickCRMIntakeAgent.py
components.description: One-click setup and configuration for bulk operations

architecture.dataFlow: Template Selection → Data Generation → Validation → Bulk Import → Verification
architecture.scalability: Supports millions of records with batching
